title: Unreleased SRAM Red AXS Groupset Leaked by X User
content:
Is the new SRAM Red AXS group about to hit the market? Leaked images show polished brake lever, and a svelte-looking derailleur and caliper.

Read the full article at Unreleased SRAM Red AXS Groupset Leaked by X User on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
